sentences: Vanglast v채ljunud mees p체체ti uuesti kinni.
Kriminaalhooldus algas kohe peale vanglast vabanemist.
context: The word 'vanglast' is the elative case form of 'vangla' (prison/jail) in Estonian, indicating movement away from or out of a place. It means 'from prison' or 'from jail'. This form shows someone who has been released from incarceration and is now outside the prison facility.
